document_data.name: Center District of Athkatla
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Center District''' of [[Athkatla]] was the city's mercantile heart.  In this sprawling ward, on the southern shores of the [[Alandor River]],  gold would always flow.

While downtown Athkatla was home to a great number of wealthy taverns, inns and halls, its most famous landmark was the great open-air marketplace, the shopping stadium known as [[Waukeen's Promenade]].
document_data.Notable locations:
*[[Daranthur's Hall]]: One of the district's shared-roof markets{{Cite dragon/407/Eye on the Realms: A Surprising Vintage|44,45}}<ref group="note">Daranthur's Hall is described as being found in "downtown Athkatla", this would most likely correspond to the ''Center District''.

*[[Silverale Hall]]

*[[Waukeen's Promenade]]: The magnificent and famous market of Athkatla, full of shops, stalls, tents with merchants from all over [[Faer√ªn]]
document_data.Inhabitants: *[[Jerlia]]: An ore merchant with a stall in the promenade
